description:
What is it: A dynamic device group that is used for assigning the Self-Deploying Intune Autopilot profile to devices. 
 Simeon Notes: This group contains corporate physical devices with the tag: 'Autopilot-SelfDeploying'. Devices can be tagged from the Intune portal or via an automated hardware hash upload. To tag in Intune: Devices > Windows Enrollment > Devices, select the required device and add to the 'Group Tag' field. To tag via automated hardware hash included with column OrderId. 
 Learn More: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/autopilot/self-deploying
